metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6533 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Icinga 2.x through 2.8.1. By editing the init.conf file, Icinga 2 can be run as root. Following this the program can be used to run arbitrary code as root. This was fixed by no longer using init.conf to determine account information for any root-executed code (a larger issue than CVE-2017-16933).

criterions.comment: icinga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
